
{{Client function}}

{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function returns the direction for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float, float, float getLightDirection ( light theLight )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:getDirection|direction|setLightDirection}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to retrieve the direction of.

=== Returns ===
Returns three [[/int.md|int]]s corresponding to the x, y and z coordinates (respectively) of the light direction, ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
function()
 local light = createLight(0, 1, 0, 4)
local lx, ly, lz = getLightDirection(light)
outputChatBox("light direction: " .. lx .. ", " .. ly .. ", " .. lz)
end 
end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
